alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 7:05PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Dale, Henry, Houston and northeastern Jackson Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 605 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ariton to near Midland City to 6 miles east of Graceville to 8 miles east of Chipley. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Abbeville, Cottonwood, Headland, Dothan, Ozark, Fort Rucker, Marianna, Taylor, Midland City, Kinsey, Ashford, Cowarts, Newton, Webb, Ariton, Columbia, Pinckard, Malone and Rehobeth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
